body:
Just wanted to share some thought with anyone who cares to listen.

I've had time to test the waters and like what I see so far. Frankly I was surprised to find as robust of a community as exists here on ruqqus. 

I'm not surprised to find that the discourse is mostly dominated by right wing thought as those were the subreddits banned by reddit. There is some left wing thought here so it's far from an echo chamber. I'm curious to see how things shake out in the months or years to come.

I like the anti-censorship stance the creators have taken. Of course there are limits to the speech even here, and some speech that's legally allowed in the US is disallowed here. That's the reality of having an online service these days. Say that which others don't like, or even allow others to say it on your site and you will find yourself without a web host or a payment processor. It's not surprising to see some guilds already banned that did not violate US law. I will watch closely how much speech this site allows, especially as it gets bigger. I wouldn't be surprised to see the site owners face tough choices even in the near future.

I tested the waters with some racial slurs and unpopular opinions and for the most part was not received too negatively. I don't know if any of my comments got removed by guildmasters. If they have, I'd like to be notified of it. 

As far as usability I like the mobile pages for the most part. The buttons could be bigger. I'd also like to see the Context button moved out of the ... Menu.

Site performance has been on the slow side. Waiting several seconds for each page to load feels like too long. This needs to be improved.

I've enjoyed the discussions so far and hope to see you all some other time.

It's not surprising to see some guilds already banned that did not violate US law. I will watch closely how much speech this site allows, especially as it gets bigger. I tested the waters with some racial slurs and unpopular opinions and for the most part was not received too negatively. I don't know if any of my comments got removed by guildmasters. If they have, I'd like to be notified of it.

title: Hello

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

post.title: Hello

body: As long as I can use swear words, I'm happy. I don't understand why people are so annoyed by [shit, piss, cunt, sucker, motherfucker and tits](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vbZhpf3sQxQ). These are just words. In the right context they can be quite amusing.
body_html: As long as I can use swear words, I'm happy. I don't understand why people are so annoyed by shit, piss, cunt, sucker, motherfucker and tits. These are just words. In the right context they can be quite amusing.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Guildmasters can't remove comments, they can only kick posts to +general. And afaik the only guild that got banned was +jailbait, and that was banned because if it wasn't the admins would be spending 90% of their time dealing with it and taking down illegal content.
body_html: Guildmasters can't remove comments, they can only kick posts to +general. And afaik the only guild that got banned was +jailbait, and that was banned because if it wasn't the admins would be spending 90% of their time dealing with it and taking down illegal content.
